subject: Order #SSN3742
description_text:
Hello,
I have bought a shifter - SIMSONN PC USB 6+R H Simulator Gear Shifter from
your shop and received it on 2025-12-06. Today I was playing a rally sim
and somehow it got stuck. It seems that the shifter mechanism jumped out of
the gated area and damaged the internals of it. Now the PC does not
recognize it anymore and it does not come up in the device list. When going
through gears, it starts to flash button LEDs rapidly. I included a video
of it acting up.

Pedals are great and work perfectly.

I would like to ask for a refund if possible and would like to send it back
to you.

Many thanks
M. R.

conversations.body_text: Hi Breevm Deity,   Please first remove the handle, then unscrew the six M4 screws on the bottom and take photos for us to review. We will identify the cause of the issue and, depending on the situation, arrange a refund or send you a replacement. This will also help us identify and improve the problem.

I am sending photos of the damage that the shaft done to the PCB.
